Class Effect

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.effects.Effect
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Tickable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExtraHealthEffect, ParalyseEffect, RegenerationEffect, ResistanceEffect
public abstract class Effect extends Object implements Cloneable, Tickable, Serializable
Represents a status effect that can be applied to an Entity. Effects can be finite (expire after a duration) or infinite (persist indefinitely). This class is abstract and requires concrete subclasses to implement effect logic. Implements Cloneable, Tickable, and Serializable.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Effect

      public Effect(String name, String description, int level, boolean isFinite, float duration, float remainingTime, Entity target)
      Constructs an effect with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the effect
      description - the description of the effect
      level - the level of the effect
      isFinite - whether the effect has a limited duration
      duration - the total duration of the effect
      remainingTime - the starting time before the effect ends
      target - the entity to apply the effect to

    • Effect

      public Effect(String name, String description, int level, boolean isFinite, float duration, Entity target)
      Constructs an effect with full duration as remaining time.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the effect
      description - the description of the effect
      level - the level of the effect
      isFinite - whether the effect has a limited duration
      duration - the total and remaining duration of the effect
      target - the entity to apply the effect to

    • setInitialValue

      protected void setInitialValue(Object initialValue)
      Sets the initial value stored when the effect is applied. Should be used to preserve the entity's original state if needed.
      Parameters:
      initialValue - the initial value

    • tick

      public void tick(float deltaTime)
      Called on each game tick. Reduces the remaining time if the effect is finite. Automatically removes the effect when time runs out.
      Specified by:
      tick in interface Tickable
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - time passed since the last tick in seconds

    • clone

      public abstract Effect clone()
      Creates a deep copy of this effect. Concrete subclasses must implement clone logic.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      a cloned instance of the effect

    • applyEffect

      public abstract void applyEffect()
      Applies the effect to the target entity. Must be implemented by subclasses.

    • removeEffect

      public abstract void removeEffect()
      Removes the effect from the target entity. Must be implemented by subclasses.
